title: October Group Ride Giveaway: A Complete All-City Cycles Cosmic Stallion Titanium!
content:
PLEASE, help keep the longest-running alt-cycling website paywall free! 

Your hard-earned money goes to supporting our independent Reportage. In doing so, you support this website’s staff and gain access to our industry-leading, private reselling platform, the Rad Bazaar!

Check this post out for all the information on how to join Group Ride for $6.66/month or $69.69/year.

SIGN UP HERE.

This month, we’ve partnered with All-City Cycles who graciously donated a complete Cosmic Stallion Titanium in their size to one lucky subscriber. Note: the build might differ slightly in its delivered form, but it will still be SRAM AXS!

Sign up by October 31st to be entered to win!

Congrats to  Reese Butler and Oliver Moss for winning the Custom Chris McNally X Tunitas Day Tote + Ripton Gift Card! kit!

The post October Group Ride Giveaway: A Complete All-City Cycles Cosmic Stallion Titanium! appeared first on The Radavist.
author: John Watson
